page.title: 01Hamlet of Thurlby
page.content:
Mainly consists of farmland and intensively managed grassland a large motor vehicle sales garage is situated in centre of hamlet. A methodist chapel is sited 16 homes and population of 61 exists.
Hamlet of Asserby Asserby is entirely agricultural consisting of 3 farms 2 small holdings and 1 residental house and paddock. The land is mostly arable with a few small grassfields for grazing livestock. There are no public services other than, mains electric, telephone, water supply and refuse collection. The 6 families comprise a population of 21 resi diets.
